stimulusHtml: The ratio of the speeds v1 / v2 is

features.html: Two satellites of masses m1 and m2 orbit a planet of mass M in circular orbits. The satellites travel in opposite directions with speeds v1 and v2, as shown in the figure above. Their orbital radii are R1 and R2,respectively. Assume that M >> m2 > m1.
